module.name: Selection
module.documentation: Processing instructions for general purpose content selection or filtering. Content may be conditionally included or excluded based on the evaluation of the delivery context . This may include capabilities of the requesting device, the user's profile (e.g. age, preferences), the user's context (e.g. location) and any dynamic factors (e.g. battery life, the transport bandwidth). A selection criterion is represented by the value of the sel:expr attribute. This module is based son elements and attributes from the DISelect specification.
